title: 2 Bedroom 1 Bath Large Classic Apartment
posting_body: Experience this lovely, large Arts and Crafts era apartment with large bright windows, original built-ins, claw foot tub, crown molding, and a gas range.
It features full size living and dining rooms, both a front and back porch, and common yard for cookouts, kids and pets.
The building is well situated, two blocks walk from Washington park, very close to the lakefront, amenities on 53rd Street, and the 47th Street Green Line stop.
It is two blocks from a fully stocked Walmart grocery store and a quick trip to Mariano’s, Jewel-Osco, Hyde Park Produce, Whole Foods, and Trader Joe’s.
Water, sewer, trash, and heat are covered by a $105 monthly Building Service Fee, which also covers snow removal, landscaping, and common area cleaning.
Tenants are responsible for cooking gas and electricity utilities.
There is a laundry center on site.
All potential candidates must be screened for a credit and background check.
Proof of income (3x rent for total household income) or student identification is also needed.
Building and lease managed by Mac Properties.
Photos show identically outfitted second-floor apartment, this vacancy is on the first floor.
To schedule a showing or see pictures of the unit as arranged by current tenants, please text or call (801)-230-6308.
